A

advance(long, TimeUnit) - Method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.ManualClock
Advances this clock's time by the given duration.

C

Clock - Class in co.paralleluniverse.vtime
Encapsulates the behavior of all JDK time-related operations.
co.paralleluniverse.vtime - package co.paralleluniverse.vtime
Time Warp
currentTimeMillis() - Method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.Clock
Returns this clock's current time in milliseconds.

G

get() - Static method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.VirtualClock
Returns the clock currently in effect for the current thread.

I

instance() - Static method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.SystemClock
 

M

ManualClock - Class in co.paralleluniverse.vtime
A clock that only progresses when its time is manually advanced by calls to advance.
ManualClock(long) - Constructor for class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.ManualClock
Creates a new ManualClock instance.
ManualClock() - Constructor for class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.ManualClock
Creates a new ManualClock instance.

N

nanoTime() - Method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.Clock
Returns the current value of this clock's high-resolution time source, in nanoseconds.

S

ScaledClock - Class in co.paralleluniverse.vtime
A clock providing scaled time (slowed down or sped up) relative to another clock.
ScaledClock(Clock, double) - Constructor for class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.ScaledClock
Constructs a ScaledClock of the a given clock.
ScaledClock(double) - Constructor for class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.ScaledClock
Constructs a ScaledClock of the system clock.
setForChildThreads(Clock) - Static method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.VirtualClock
Puts the given clock in effect for future child threads -- but not the current thread -- unless overridden by setForCurrentThread.
setForCurrentThread(Clock) - Static method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.VirtualClock
Puts the given clock in effect for the current thread.
setForCurrentThreadAndChildren(Clock) - Static method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.VirtualClock
Puts the given clock in effect for the current thread and future child threads, unless overridden by setForCurrentThread.
setGlobal(Clock) - Static method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.VirtualClock
Puts the given clock in effect for the all threads, unless overridden by setForCurrentThread or by setForCurrentThreadAndChildren.
setGlobalExceptCurrentThread(Clock) - Static method in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.VirtualClock
Puts the given clock in effect for the all threads except the current one, unless overridden by setForCurrentThread or by setForCurrentThreadAndChildren.
startNanos - Variable in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.ScaledClock
 
startTime - Variable in class co.paralleluniverse.vtime.ScaledClock

The system clock.

V

VirtualClock - Class in co.paralleluniverse.vtime
